tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AssetMaintenanceSchedule (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    service_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    last_service_date DATE,
    next_service_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    service_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE asset (asset_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
              asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
              last_service_date DATE,
              next_service_date DATE,
              description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
              asset_id INTEGER REFERENCES asset(asset_id),
              service_date DATE,
              service_type VARCHAR(50),
              technician_id INTEGER,
              completion_status BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_due_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE asset_maintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  task_id INT,
  last_serviced_date DATE,
  next_service_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assigned_tasks (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_id INT,
  personnel_id INT,
  assigned_date DATE,
  completed_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_id) REFERENCES asset_maintenance(maintenance_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (personnel_id) REFERENCES maintenance_personnel(personnel_id)
);
